text: Kare ga ten kara ame o furase rarereba, sono ryō ni ōjite tani o nagare, honryū wa ukabu awa o nosete hakobi saru. Mata sōshoku-hin ya dōgu o tsukuru tame ni (kinzoku) o hi ni kakete mo, sore to onaji awa (ga dekiru). Ko no yō ni arrā wa, shinjitsu to kyogi to o teiji nasa reru. Awa wa chiri no yō ni kiesaru. Daga jinrui o ekisuru mono wa, chijō ni nokoru. Arrā wa kono yō ni, shuju no tatoe de tokiakasa reru
